clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of Video Based Education Versus Music Therapy on Anxiety, Experience, and Co-operation Among Patients Undergoing Magnetic Resonance Imaging in Radiology Department at ILBS, New Delhi.
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of Video Based Education Versus Music Therapy on Anxiety, Experience, and Co-operation Among Patients Undergoing Magnetic Resonance Imaging in Radiology Department at ILBS, New Delhi.

lead_sponsor.agency: Institute of Liver and Biliary Sciences, India

clinical_study.source: Institute of Liver and Biliary Sciences, India

brief_summary.textblock: A study to assess the Effectiveness of Video Based Education Versus Music Therapy on Anxiety, Experience, and Co-operation among Patients undergoing Magnetic Resonance Imaging. This is a Experimental Multiple Interventions Pre test - Post test Design. Three groups namely, Video Based Education group, Music Therapy Group and control groups are there in study.There will be significant difference in the Mean Anxiety Scores, Experience level, and Co-operation level of patients undergoing MRI in Video Based Education , Music Therapy group and Control Group

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Participants were assigned randomly to three groups

primary_outcome.measure: to assess the effectiveness of Video Based Education Versus Music Therapy on Anxiety, Experience, and Cooperation among patients undergoing Magnetic Resonance Imaging
primary_outcome.description: State Trait Anxiety Inventory-state form (STAI-S) scale, Patients' Scan Experience Scale and Cooperation Scale for MRI Procedure respectively will be use

clinical_study.condition: Effectiveness of Video Based Education Versus Music Therapy on Anxiety, Experience, and Co-operation Among Patients Undergoing Magnetic Resonance Imaging

arm_group.description: Video Based Education was given before undergoing MRI procedure and Anxiety was assessed within 20 minutes of Intervention. Assessment of Experience, Co-operation and Opinion regarding intervention was done.
Music Therapy was given before undergoing MRI procedure and Anxiety was assessed within 20 minutes of Intervention. Assessment of Experience, Co-operation and Opinion regarding intervention was done.
Routine Information was given before undergoing MRI procedure and Anxiety was assessed within 20 minutes of Intervention. Assessment of Experience, Co-operation was done.

intervention.description: Video Based Education and Music Therapy was given as a part of Interventions to relieve anxiety of patients undergoing Magnetic Resonance Imaging

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- undergoing MRI with or without contrast
- having age between 18- 60 years.
- alert, oriented
- able to comprehend, speak and listen English or Hindi.
- patients without hearing and visual impairment.
- available during period of data collection
Exclusion Criteria:
- unconscious
- critically ill and sedated.
- visiting Radiology Department for other procedures such as Computed Tomography scan, and MRI brain
- having pain score of 3-10 on universal pain assessment scale..

clinical_study.keyword: Anxiety, Video Based Education, Music Therapy, Experience, Cooperation, Magnetic Resonance Imaging
